text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically requires that the response explains that the KPI for the GAAR Defense control is a binary metric, confirming whether a commercial rationale defence file exists contemporaneously for all high-risk steps. The candidate answer provides several KPIs under Control Point 3.1 (Tax Position Assessment & GAAR Risk Scoring) and Control Point 3.2 (Primary Purpose Documentation), but none of the listed KPIs are explicitly described as a binary metric confirming the contemporaneous existence of a commercial rationale defense file for high-risk steps. For instance, KPI 3.1.2 is 'High-risk GAAR positions identified' (Monitored), and 3.2.1 is '% of material positions with documented primary purpose' (Target 100%). While 'Genuine commercial rationale' is a component of the risk score (3.1 GAAR Risk Scoring Framework), the required KPI itself (a binary check on contemporaneous file existence) is missing.", "criterion_id": "a85735ff-ff32-4ffc-9f8b-6b04dff5966d"}
